name: The Quest for Cats
description:
Introduction

Go on a whimsical adventure for Cats! Big ones, small ones, ones that climb on fences, All the Cats! Explore and solve some mild puzzles in a simple minimalistic world.

Game Description

This game was made using the Bitsy game engine which is a very simple and easy to use tool for creating simple and small games, allowing you to focus on just a few core ideas and designs.

The CONTROLS are only the Arrow Keys, or, alternatively, WASD on your keyboard.

You move your Avatar/Character using those controls, and you can interact with objects by walking into them.

Afterword

Sorry if there are any bugs! Feel free to point any out. I may get around to fixing any that pop up as well as possibly adding some more Cats and Rooms if I find the time.

Alright then, have fun people!

~Ripple

Special Mentions

Bitsy Game Engine by Adam Ledoux: Thank you for creating such an awesome and easy to use tool!! And for keeping Bitsy updated and for communicating with the Bitsy Community!

Bitsy Discord: Bitsy has its own cozy community and it rocks!! Thank you so much guys for always answering my questions about Bitsy and for being fun and amazing and did I already say helpful and supportive? It can never be said enough!!
